description: This is a Java source file defining a REST controller for managing datasets, including uploading, listing, retrieving, downloading, and deleting dataset files.

classes.name: DatasetController
classes.description: A Spring REST controller providing API endpoints for dataset upload, listing, retrieval, download, and deletion.

methods.name: upload
methods.description: Handles dataset file uploads and delegates to datasetService.upload.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Returns a list of all datasets.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves details of a specific dataset by ID.

methods.name: download
methods.description: Facilitates downloading of the dataset file.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Removes a dataset record and associated file.
